name: Darkvision
description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

name: Extra Attack
description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

name: Spellcasting
description: You can cast spells as defined by your class spellcasting feature.

name: Ability Score Improvement
description: Increase ability scores or take a feat.
